description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax...
full_summary:
**Multi Band Satellite Simulator System**

* **Reference:** PW-22-01014516
* **Solicitation Number:** W8482-230503/A
* **Publication Date:** November 25, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 9, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **End User:** Department of National Defence

**Objective:**

The Department of National Defence seeks to procure multi-band satellite simulator systems for use at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. The systems are required to serve as training aids for various defense-related activities. Relevant specifications for the items are detailed below:

**Required Items:**

* Multi-band satellite simulator system (Part No.: CST-SS-130135, NCAGE: KCT65)
	+ Quantity: 2 (1 for CFB Esquimalt and 1 for CFB Halifax)
	+ Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
	+ Brand name and model/Part Number and NCAGE for equivalent or substitute products must be specified

**Submission Information:**

* Bidders may submit their proposals in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* Documents, including the RFP and annexes, are available for download from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
* Contact information for queries and correspondence can be found below:

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Cassandra Leach
* Email: cassandra.leach@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 999-999-9999

**люч силы]:

* **Obligations and Conditions:** The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* **Translations of documents:** Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

Channels of Enquiries:

* Canada Buys: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)
* Electronics Procurement: [bussiness-pbip				.info/@tsxqed01](mailto:bussiness-pbip. mandatory)

Следовательно, после возникших транслитерационных неточностей, правильная запись записывается на указанном формат.
